metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0160 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A deadlock flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s BPF subsystem. This flaw allows a local user to potentially crash the system.

notes.Note: sbeattie> first attempt to fix was reverted in 8c5c2a4898e3 ("bpf, sockmap: Revert buggy deadlock fix in the sockhash and sockmap") unfixed upstream as of 2023.06.14

criterions.comment: linux package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
